Package com.strath.hub

Class Summary
AccelerometerWrapper An abstraction of accelerometer data.
BluetoothLinkService Set up and manage Bluetooth connections.
DataGatheringService Service which controls starting and stopping gathering data.
Hub The main activity and entry-point of the app.
HubDbHelper Helper class for accessing the database.
HubDbOpenHelper Helper class for opening and creating hub_db.sqlite3, to be used * in conjuction with HubDbHelper.
LocationReceiver Listen for location updates from the LocationManager
LocationWrapper An abstraction of location data.
SyncAlarmReceiver Listen for a pending intent triggered by an android.app.AlarmManager in DataGatheringService and start syncService.
SyncService Synchronise locally stored data with a server.
TemperatureWrapper An abstraction of temperature data.
